recipe.title: Heart-Shaped Avocado Toast (Cancer) Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Scoop the avocado into a medium bowl. Season with salt and add the lemon juice. Mash until smooth.
Cut out the center of the bread with heart-shaped cookie cutter. Set aside.
Melt the butter in a medium skillet over medium-low heat. Add the heart and cut-out piece of bread and toast until golden brown, 2-3 minutes.
Flip the bread, then crack the egg into the cut-out. Cover and cook for 1-2 minutes, until the white is set and the yolk is runny, or to your desired doneness.
Transfer to a plate and spread the avocado over the heart.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Scoop the avocado into a medium bowl.
Season with salt and add the lemon juice.
Cut out the center of the bread with heart-shaped cookie cutter.
Melt the butter in a medium skillet over medium-low heat.
Add the heart and cut-out piece of bread and toast until golden brown, 2-3 minutes.
Flip the bread, then crack the egg into the cut-out.
Cover and cook for 1-2 minutes, until the white is set and the yolk is runny, or to your desired doneness.
Transfer to a plate and spread the avocado over the heart.
